short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Feyisa Berisa This extension enforce Chrome/Chromium to go Incognito mode if url tagged with /Justme modified from always-incognito

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
How to use just tag the main domain with justme and hit enter  example :if you want to go to google.com 
just do google.com/justme - this will open the url in incognito mode.

update to version 0.3
